newsitem.title: USA: UtiliCorp to get $53 mln from Kansas City Power.
newsitem.headline: UtiliCorp to get $53 mln from Kansas City Power.

text.p: UtiliCorp United Inc will receive $53 million from Kansas City Power and Light Co in the wake of KCP&L's decision to merge with Western Resources Inc Friday, UtiliCorp and KCP&L said.

The payment is due under terms of KCP&L's previous merger agreement, which was torn asunder after Western Resource's hostile takeover bid prevented KCP&L from receiving enough shareholder votes to approve the merger last year.

KCP&L paid UtiliCorp an initial $5 million in September when shareholders failed to endorse the merger. The additional $53 million was triggered by the merger agreement Friday between KCP&L and Western Resources, the company said.
